entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Client result method accepting arguments that is unhandled by the client results in hanging until timeout #46825
  • Expose the SslStream and Cipher Suite on ITlsHandshakeFeature #46823
  • Blazor WebAssembly loading indicator shows more than 100% in .NET 8 Preview 1 #46822
  • Local build for v6.0.14 on Linux (WSL) is failing on Yarn #46821
  • Examine the performance of AdditionalAssemblies in Router #46820
  • Configure or disable timeouts on long running requests #46818
    8.0-preview4
  • Azure AppService terminating Asp net core web app (.net 5) process #46817
  • Perf regression: ApiCrudAddProduct #46816
  • Perf regression: connectionclosehttps #46815
  • Perf regression: fortunes_ef, plaintext, plaintext #46814
  • Calling Asynchronous .NET JS Interop Method Synchronously from JS Produces Misleading Error Message #46811
  • E2E tests `WebDriverExtensions.Navigate` argument `noReload` has no effect #46810
  • Debugging & Hot Reload is Broken When App's Base Path is Changed #46809
  • Add WebViewManager.Dispatch() method #46808
    8.0-preview2
  • [Blazor Server] OnConnectionUp and Down every three minutes #46807
  • Identity: Adding user to role gives an Invalid Username error (UserManager.cs). #46806
  • Automatic setting of required attribute on primitive types #46805
  • bind:after does not compile on SDK 7.0.200 #46803
  • `IEmailSender` doesn't appear to be HTML message in gmail body. #46802
  • It will need about 18 mins to stop connection(disconnecting to disconnected) when it lost network(Like disble WiFi insterface). And it wil cause Linux Segmentation Fault when I try to call hub_connection::stop() while connection state is disconnecting. #46801
  • Append version tag helper does not work for scoped CSS and blazor.webassembly.js #46798
  • CS0234: The type or namespace name '...' does not exist in the namespace when using CascadingTypeAttribute #46797
  • Not all values of `Url.Page(values)` show up in the Get method of the page model #46796
  • Blazor insertion into List issue with method OnInitialized #46795
  • blazor client side canot inject httpservice to LoggerProvider #46794
  • [API Proposal] Productize QuickGrid #46789
  • Remove special case handling for numeric type parameter binding in RDF? #46788

Closed

  • Perf regression: ApiCrudUpdateProduct #46792
  • Cookie configuration mystery using `AddCookie` and `ConfigureApplicationCookie` #45788
    Discussions
  • Layout for Component #46771
  • Kestrel config behaves differently when set using env vars vs. in-code #45801
    8.0-preview2
  • Can Not Start Debugging #46799
  • Enhance Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.WebAssembly.MultipartBundle package to define a custom bundle format #36978
    .NET 8 Planning

PullRequests

Created

  • Expose the SslStream and Cipher Suite on ITlsHandshakeFeature #46824
    area-runtime
  • Tidy up some irregularities in certificate reloading #46819
    area-runtime
  • Allow Regex engine to be trimmed #46813
    area-runtime
  • Disable Selenium headless mode #46812
  • Brunolins16/minimal/sourcegen/46297 #46791
    area-runtime
  • Update Selenium versions #46790
    area-infrastructure

Merged

  • Introduce 'RenderTreeBuilder.AddComponentParameter()' #46562
    area-blazor, pending-ci-rerun, 8.0-preview2
  • Dispose of old cancellationTokenSource instances during revalidation … #46736
    area-blazor, community-contribution, 8.0-preview2
  • Defer search for dev cert until build bind time #46296
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview2
  • Refactor RoutePatternFactory to trim regex dependency where possible #46793
    area-runtime, area-web-frameworks, 8.0-preview2

Updated

  • TryParse support for request delegate source generator #46696
    area-runtime
  • Fallback using the `CultureInfo.Parent` instead of using hyphen #46637
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Eliminate framework use of 'IJSUnmarshalledRuntime' #46693
    area-blazor
  • Implement request timeout middleware #46115
    area-runtime, community-contribution, blog-candidate
  • Expand FromX support and add route vs. query param inference #46715
    area-web-frameworks
  • Add short circuit in routing #46713
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Sections support #46727
    area-blazor
  • Add WebViewManager.Dispatch() method #46644
    area-blazor
  • Productize QuickGrid #46573
    area-blazor
  • Backport SignalR test changes #46648
    area-signalr, tell-mode, pending-ci-rerun, 7.0.x
  • [release/7.0] gRPC JSON transcoding: Fix known type messages in querystring values #46752
    Servicing-consider, area-grpc, 7.0.x
  • [release/7.0] gRPC JSON transcoding: Fix not supporting JSON name in querystring names #46750
    Servicing-consider, area-grpc, 7.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Bump template tests timeout #46783
    area-mvc, tell-mode, test-fixed, 6.0.x
